name: The Drill - [Ludum Dare 48]
description:
The Drill

Fight waves of mechanicals enemies as you try to dig down until the place they are built with your DRILL! Eject the spiders that damage your machine and stop the Flying enemies before they rush you to make you fall from your own plateform.

Good luck!

Enemies: 

  • Spider: Damage your Drill, Static, Lot of health, Not very resistant to knockback 
  • Bat: Do not damage your Drill, Fast, Low Health

You can vote my game on Ludum Dare page. Feel free to comment me possible balancing! 

Thank you all!
